start.text: The chorus of war begins once more, wonderful!
Once more we take our places upon the deadly stage of the stars.

start_boss.text: *Glass tapping* A toast, to the beautiful fabric that binds our very world together!

retreat.text: Not every dance is elegant, oh well...

out_of_missiles.text: Our singers tire, let them rest.
An instrument has played it's part, and falls silent.

engaged.text: Don't tire now, the dance has only begun, O' Partner Mine!
The drum of ballistics, the hum of energy, and the screams of missiles, it all arranges so pleasantly.
The sweet music of the void, do you hear it too, O Listener Mine?

need_help.text: You dance well, however I prefer a partner I know.
Ahh, the rush of tension, what an exciting sensation!
The thunder rumbles, overwhelming, now's the time to turn the tide!

pursuing.text: Our partner tires, let them rest.
Onto the next act of this elegant display.

running.text: As much as I'd like to, this tune isn't for me.

hull_90.text: A mark upon the masterful design, yet holding strong!
Steady your gaze, their shells grazed, return the chorus of gunfire.

hull_50.text: Alarms ringing, the rush of adrenaline, the squeals of torn metal, how exciting!
Now is no time to pause, we've come so very far!

hull_30.text: One moment, caught on that fine border between life or death!
Say, do you believe in miracles?

overload.text: And thus, our dance attains intermission...
Though we cannot reply, the song continues on!

death.text: My part in the play has come to a close, adieu
It seems we couldn't keep pace with the rhythm of the battle.
All this time, and still not enough to see...*static*

victory.text: And the dance concludes, the stage emptying once more as curtains fall...
You've put on a splendid show since your first steps upon the stars.
Ah, the song concludes, a thrilling display as always.
